Work.Title: mtMax GmbH
Work.Content: Development of Android based Point of Sales Software. Work included integration of ZVT and SumUp Payment APIs, PDF Invoice System, Customer Display API, CSV and Excel import/export for a time tracking system. (Java, Android OS, Hardware Interface, REST Api)

Volunteering.Title: KjG Wiesloch
Volunteering.Content: Counselor for an annual two week youth camp in my hometown. The camp has a size of approx. 80 Kids  between 6 and 16 and 30 counselors. During my time I was one of the camp leaders in 2016 and the organizations treasurer from 2012-2014
